This Tic Tac Toe app is a project created to test my Knowledge of Android after rounding-up all Udacity\'s beginner courses on android in the ALC 2.0 android beginner program. Shout-out to my android learning accountabilibuddies Essien, Kenneth(Kenzie), Wisdom and my ALC family. You guys are awesome! You can reach out to me via the buttons below.

1. Player vs CPU [3 x 3] board: Choose either the X or O radio button and press Begin. Play Against the ai and win by having X or O in three places - horizontally, diagonally or vertically. If it gets too easy, click on the "Play against difficult AI" at the bottom of the screen to play on the highest difficulty

2. Player vs CPU [5 x 5] board: Choose either the X or O radio button and press Begin. Play Against the ai and win by having X or O in five places - horizontally, diagonally or vertically. If it gets too easy, click on the "Play against difficult AI" at the bottom of the screen to play on the highest difficulty
3. Player vs Player mode [3 x 3] board: Same rules in the player vs CPU mode but player 1 chooses a character while player 2 automatically becomes the next character

4. Player vs Player mode [5 x 5] board: Win another player by having X or O in five places at any point on the [5 x 5] board. Player 1 chooses a character while player 2 automatically becomes the next character.

5. Player vs Player mode [5 x 5] board (3 x 3 rules): A special mode which the rules of the standard tic tac toe on a [3 x 3] is applied on a bigger [5 x 5] board. Win another player by having X or O in three places at any point on the [5 x 5] board. Player 1 chooses a character while player 2 automatically becomes the next character.

6. Player vs Player mode [4 x 4] board : A special mode which the rules of the standard tic tac toe on a [3 x 3] is applied on a bigger [5 x 5] board. Win another player by having X or O in three places at any point on the [5 x 5] board. Player 1 chooses a character while player 2 automatically becomes the next character.

7. (COMING SOON) Player vs CPU mode [5 x 5] board (3 x 3 rules): A special mode which the rules of the standard tic tac toe on a [3 x 3] is applied on a bigger [5 x 5] board. Win tha AI by having X or O in three places at any point on the [5 x 5] board.
